execution_plan.description: Get the number of order items per order (order_id -> item_count) from the Order_Items table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, COUNT(*) AS item_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id;

execution_plan.description: Fetch order dates for the orders returned by step 1. The application will filter step 1 results to keep only order_ids with item_count >= 2 and substitute them into the placeholder in this query.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, date_order_placed FROM Orders WHERE order_id IN ($step1.order_id);
